data.script:
<script>
    import {TextInput} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<TextInput
    value="This input should be about 4 characters wide."
    span_x="4"
/>

<TextInput
    is="textarea"
    value="This input should be about 3 lines tall."
    span_y="3"
/>
data.title: TextInput Span X + Y
